org.apache.archiva.components.graph.base

Class DirectedGraph<V extends Node<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.archiva.components.graph.base.DirectedGraph<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - The node implementation.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph<V>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleGraph

    public abstract class DirectedGraph<V extends Node<V>>
extends Object
implements Graph<V>
    Abstract implementation of a directed graph

      Creates a new edge instance with the given id or returns the edge instance with the given id.

      Adds a new node if the id does not exist yet, otherwise returns the node with the given id and the new label set.

    • Method Detail

      • newNode

        public V newNode(String label)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Creates a node with the given label in the graph. The id of the node is generated by the graph implementation. The method returns always a new node instance, even if a node with the given label exists already.
        Specified by:
        newNode in interface Graph<V extends Node<V>>
        Parameters:
        label - the label of the new node
        Returns:
        a new node instance with the given label and a generated id

      • addNode

        public V addNode(String id,
                 String label)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Adds a new node if the id does not exist yet, otherwise returns the node with the given id and the new label set.
        Specified by:
        addNode in interface Graph<V extends Node<V>>
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the node
        label - the label of the node
        Returns:
        a new node instance or the existing node with the given id

        protected V createNewNode()

      • createNewEdge

        protected Edge<V> createNewEdge(RelationType type,
                                V sourceNode,
                                V destinationNode)
        Creates a new edge instance on each method call. The id will be a generated UUID.
        Parameters:
        type - the relation type
        sourceNode - the source node
        destinationNode - the destination node
        Returns:
        the new edge instance

      • newEdge

        public Edge<V> newEdge(String label,
                       V sourceNode,
                       V destinationNode)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Creates a new edge instance with the given label. The method returns always a new edge instance, even if a edge with the given label exists already. The type is set to StandardRelationType.DEFAULT
        Specified by:
        newEdge in interface Graph<V extends Node<V>>
        Parameters:
        label - the edge label
        sourceNode - the source node
        destinationNode - the destination node
        Returns:
        a new edge instance

                       String label,
                       V sourceNode,
                       V destinationNode)
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Creates a new edge instance with the given label. The method returns always a new edge instance, even if a edge with the given label exists already.

        Parameters:

        label - the edge label
        sourceNode - the source node

      • addEdge

        public Edge<V> addEdge(RelationType type,
                       String id,
                       String label,
                       V sourceNode,
                       V destinationNode)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Creates a new edge instance with the given id or returns the edge instance with the given id and type. If a edge with the id exists already but with a different type it will throw a IllegalArgumentException
        Specified by:
        addEdge in interface Graph<V extends Node<V>>
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the edge
        id - the id
        label - the edge label
        sourceNode - the source node
        destinationNode - the destination node
        Returns:
        the newly created edge instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if a edge instance with the given id but a different type exists already. Or if source or destination node is null

      • addEdge

        public Edge<V> addEdge(String id,
                       String label,
                       V sourceNode,
                       V destinationNode)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: Graph
        Creates a new edge instance with the given id or returns the edge instance with the given id. If the edge is newly created it will get the type StandardRelationType.DEFAULT
        Specified by:
        addEdge in interface Graph<V extends Node<V>>
        Parameters:
        id - the id
        label - the edge label
        sourceNode - the source node
        destinationNode - the destination node
        Returns:
        the newly created edge instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if source or destination is null
